5000.name: The Forgotten Caverns
5000.description:
You have just entered the Caverns of the Forgotten Kings. As
you look around you notice that the cavern has no light source.
You also hear the continuous sound of  [dripping]  water. The
Caverns has a damp and musty smell to it like it hasn't seen
the light of day in over a generation. It appears that the
caverns have been recently , attacked due to pieces of the [sarcophagi] lying
on the floor in front of you As you look at the wall there is a [plaque] that
has been nailed into it.

exdescs.dripping:
&BAs you shine your light toward the ceiling you notice the muliply spots
the water is dripping from.
exdescs.plaque:
---------------------------------------------------------------------------
Welcome to the Caverns of the  Forgotten Kings. The names of the Kings have
been lost. And for the most port so have the Caverns that housed them.
People don't actually know the name of this place so it and most of its
history has almost been entirely forgotten. Hence the name Forgotten
Caverns. Journey on word my fellow adventurer and see what history  these
Caverns house for you.

Be Warn tho everyone who entered before you has never come bacK!!!!!
---------------------------------------------------------------------------
exdescs.sarcophagi: &zAs you look in the sarcophagus. You notice that they are competely empty.
exdescs.water:
&BAs you shine your light toward the ceiling you notice the muliply spots
the water is dripping from.

5001.name: The Forgotten Caverns
5001.description:
As you travel deeper into the dungeon you notice that the water
continues to  [drip]  and the musty moldy smell seems to be getting worse.
That is probably due to the mold that is growing on ceiling in
here.

5002.name: The Forgotten Caverns
5002.description:
You have finally entered the heart of the caverns. The
drippings seems to have stopped for some reason. As you look
around, this place was once rich with artifacts. But, due to this
place being here for thousands of years, graverobbers have taken
everything of value.

5003.name: The Forgotten Caverns
5003.description:
As you look around you notice that this must have been an
important place because it's completely empty save for a  [plaque]
on the wall. A  [circle]  on the floor. Who knows what that was
used for. The walls appear to be very dry lacking of anything
on them.

exdescs.circle:
&RAs you look at the ground the circle you noticed as you walked in is a
large red circle with a smaller red  circle in the middle of it. Probablly
used for a cerimony. But no one knows for sure. Because the place was
never documented.
exdescs.plaque:
---------------------------------------------------------------------------
If you are reading this, then it's for 1 of two reason. Either, you are a
crazy adventurer and are comming here to find fame and fourtune. Or, you
stummbled across the Room of Bright Lights Which for you sake. I hope it
was the former not the ladder. having wrote that, either way you are doom
to live here  forever because no one has entered and left alive... HAHA!!!
---------------------------------------------------------------------------

5004.name: The Forgotten Caverns
5004.description:
This is one of the many hallways in the tomb of the forgotten kings. There
seems to be a lot of them. THere really isn't much differance between one room
and the next. Just the same bland jagged rock walls lining the sides.

5024.name: The Forgotten Caverns
5024.description:
This is one of many rooms where the kings were buried. You notice the 2
[sarcophagi] in the middle of the room. With desks and [shelves] surrounding
them. The Kings were often buried with there most prized possessions.

exdescs.sarcophagi:
&zAs you look at the sarcophagus you notice that something evil has happened
seeing as that it is open and empty.
exdescs.shelves:
As you look at the shelves they appear to have nothing on them. execpt for a
few broken things. Apparently thay were ran sacked a long time ago by grave
robbers.

5043.name: Room of Bright Lights
5043.description:
This is the room of Blight Lights.
As you enter the room,
you feel like you are being pulled into another location.
One that seems oddly familiar.
like you have been here before.

5075.name: The Forgotten Caverns
5075.description:
This is one of many rooms where the kings were buried. You notice the 2
[sarcophagi] in the middle of the room. With desks and [shelves] surrounding
them. The Kings were often buried with there most prized possessions.
As you look around you see yet another  [plaque] on the wall.

exdescs.plaque:
---------------------------------------------------------------------------
Bah!!! so i guess you picked right.. or, you didn't and doubled back or
made the right choice the first time and have no idea why i am mad...
either way you shouldn't of come this far go back while you still can!!!
Your life depends on it!!! Don't Keep going... You should really quit the
mud.. There is no point in going on.. If you take my advice you will not
have to deal with the issues of finshing this Dungeon.. Trust me you don't
want to see the end of it.. It's nasty and not something you want to see.
Just type quit and never come back!! Trust me...
---------------------------------------------------------------------------

&zAs you look at the sarcophagus you notice that something evil has happened
seeing as that it is open and empty.
exdescs.shelves:
&OAs you look at the shelves they appear to have nothing on them. Execpt, for
a few broken things. Apparently thay were ran sacked a long time ago by grave
robbers.

5076.name: The Forgotten Caverns

5077.name: The Forgotten Caverns
5077.description:
This is one of the many hallways in the tomb of the forgotten kings. There
seems to be a lot of them. THere really isn't much differance between one room
and the next. Just the same bland jagged rock walls lining the sides.

5078.name: The Forgotten Caverns
5078.description:
This was once the room to the most important king. or so the story goes,
now it just a bland broken room with a door leading to thetreasure room.
Apparently this room is no longer home to the body of the king now it's the
throne room to the necromanser that now
inhabites the place.
From which he orders his minions to do his bidding for him...
Some of which are living breathing creatures some are just reanimated bodies of
the king.

5079.name: The Forgotten Caverns
5079.description:
After laying the kings and covering up the main enterance into
the caverns. This room was used as the only way out. The room
is surrounded by shelves. That may or may not have ever been
coverd by things. tho one can assume so since there are broken
 [vases]  on the floor. you notice yet another  [plaque]  nailed to the
wall in this room.

exdescs.plaque:
---------------------------------------------------------------------------
Congratulation! on killing the evil vial monster.  As you can probably
guess at this point I lied. I write this because i wrote in the past that
no one has ever made it out of here alive. Well, how can that be if you
have been reading the various plaques that have been scattered though
out.. At some point you had to think to yourself, how can thses be up if
no one has lived. By the way, the ladder  you see behind you takes you
back  to the enterance. so that being the only way out if the main
enterance is blocked is totally not real. Tho like everything else in
here. No one actually knows what happened. For the kings where buried over
1000 years and no one wrote   who they were, why they were buryed here or
how this place  Was built..
---------------------------------------------------------------------------
exdescs.vases:
&YAs you look closely at the pieces of the vase. It looks like it was at
some point a very elagent piece of solid gold with an empressive design
panted on it.. Now it's sadly worth nothing in pieces.

5080.name: The Forgotten Caverns
5080.description:
This is one of the many hallways in the tomb of the forgotten kings. There
seems to be a lot of them. THere really isn't much differance between one room
and the next. Just the same bland jagged rock walls lining the sides.

5081.name: The Forgotten Caverns
5081.description:

seems to be a lot of them. THere really isn't much differance between one room
and the next. Just the same bland jagged rock walls lining the sides.

5082.description:

5083.name: The Forgotten Caverns
5083.description:
This is one of many rooms where the kings were buried. You notice the 2
[sarcophagi] in the middle of the room. With desks and [shelves] surrounding
them. The Kings were often buried with there most prized possessions.

exdescs.sarcophagi:
&zAs you look at the sarcophagus you notice that something evil has happened
seeing as that it is open and empty.
exdescs.shelves:
As you look at the shelves they appear to have nothing on them. execpt for a
few broken things. Apparently thay were ran sacked a long time ago by grave
robbers.
&OAs you look at the shelves they appear to have nothing on them. Execpt, for
a few broken things. Apparently thay were ran sacked a long time ago by grave
robbers.

5091.name: The Forgotten Caverns
5091.description:
This is one of the many hallways in the tomb of the forgotten kings. There
seems to be a lot of them. THere really isn't much differance between one room

As you look around you notice another  [plaque]  on the wall.

exdescs.plaque:
---------------------------------------------------------------------------
Ah!! I see that you are getting farther along in here. To bad you took the
long way... Tho to tell you the truth i didn't think you would make it
this far. I quess everyone is allowed to make mistakes. But, when you get
to the fork in the road, are you going to take the right one? No, one has
ever gone the right way will you be the first? I guess there is only way
way to find out...
---------------------------------------------------------------------------
